solution_line_template: He writes each friend {pages_per_letter}*{num_friends}=<<{pages_per_letter}*{num_friends}={pages_per_week_per_time}>>{pages_per_week_per_time} pages a week
So he writes {pages_per_week_per_time}*{times_per_week}=<<{pages_per_week_per_time}*{times_per_week}={pages_per_week}>>{pages_per_week} pages every week
That means he writes {pages_per_week}*{weeks_per_year}=<<{pages_per_week}*{weeks_per_year}={pages_per_year}>>{pages_per_year} pages a year
